content: ***this is a free pattern but it s intended for personal use only do not redistribute this pattern by yourself even if credits are given to the author this still constitutes copyright infringement *** this is a pattern to crochet princess anna not the finished doll crochet level intermediate and above the pattern is a pdf document with written instructions on how to crochet the doll and her dress accompanied by explanatory pictures and drawings the finished doll should be around 13cm tall and 5cm wide of course it depends on how you work and on the kind of hook and yarn used feel free to contact me on instagram to provide me with your feedback and if you shall have any doubt about the instructions ***please mention the author me when posting online on instagram specify pattern by @chiacrafts and use hashtag #chiacraftspatterns *** i hope this pattern will be useful to you that you ll have lots of fun and that the doll you re going to create will make somebody very happy
